entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:44 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 08:00 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: SSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High 16. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:42 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:42 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Friday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Freezing rain or ice pellets beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the morning. High zero. Forecast issued 05:42 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016
